title: Anime font ID : A weird typeface
content:
Hi, all.

Does anyone know what this typeface is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204060328im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clannadtitle_6468.png)
  
This is the title of Clannad, a Japanese anime currently being aired on Tokyo Broadcasting System. 

Besides the good story, I'm sort of interested in the strange fonts in the tittle, especially A in display,relatively small uppercase R because I've never seen A letterform like that. I wonder if the font is another customization. How do you think?
author: metaspace

comments.content:
Based on the 'R' and 'S', I'd say this is that upright version of Eras with a modified 'A' and 'C'.

- Lex
